title: Crypto_Dash
description: Crypto Dash is a real-time cryptocurrency dashboard that displays live coin prices, market trends, and historical charts using public crypto APIs.

title: GitHub_Finder
description: GitHub Finder is a React-based application for searching GitHub users.It fetches and displays user profiles and repositories using the GitHub public API.
